meanings.definition: To refuse to accept or consider
meanings.sent1: She will reject the offer to join the club.
meanings.sent2: I always reject spicy food because it upsets my stomach.
meanings.sent3: The cat will reject the new brand of food and stick to its favorite.
meanings.sent4: His body will reject any food that is not organic.
meanings.sent5: The teacher will reject any late assignments without exception.

meanings.definition: A person or thing dismissed as inadequate or unacceptable
meanings.sent1: He felt like a reject after not making the team.
meanings.sent2: The reject from the audition ended up becoming a successful actor.
meanings.sent3: The broken toy became the reject in the toy box.
meanings.sent4: The reject in the group project turned out to be the most creative.
meanings.sent5: The reject in the collection turned out to be a valuable antique.
